name: Wickwar Station Porter 500Ml (L)
description: Smooth, Chocolately, Roasted Coffee & Very Drinkable.

*Station Porter in cask was awarded the accolade of "SUPREME CHAMPION" at the WINTER ALES BEER FESTIVAL 2008. A smooth, dark ruby porter with complexity of tastes including chocolate, coffee and rich fruit.

We produce truly hand crafted, Award Winning Beers, brewed using the finest English Floor malted barley, subtle blends of local hops and fresh Cotswold water. Fermented in traditional vessels using our own strain of yeast.
PromotionDescription: 100 extra points on Fuller's London Pride ale 500ml bottle
